name: Curse of the Arrow
description:
Explore areas, solve puzzles, and fight against the curse that was imposed on you by an ancient statue!

Your only weapon is a bow and a single arrow to defend yourself against your own corruption!

Use your arrows as platforms, fight against enemies, toggle switches, and push boxes, and die (over and over)! 

Curse of the Arrow is a challenging platformer made in a tiny resolution (192x128 pixels) in LÖVE.  

Curse of the Arrow features:

  • 5 chapters with 100 levels!
  • An original soundtrack created by Failpositive, (get it here!)
  • Four difficulty levels to choose from to change things up, or make them easier!
  • Solving puzzles and fighting enemies, at the same time!
  • Gamepad support! 
  • Pets you can buy as you progress through the game!
  • You will probably die a lot!

Each room is filled with puzzles, obstacles, coins, awesome art and secrets. Can you make your way through them and remove the curse! Will you take on this challenge? 

If you beat the game, share your time & death count on twitter, under the hashtag #CurseoftheArrow!  Inspired by such great games as Spelunky, Speer, and Terraria. A tiny spoiler, this is all 100 levels together!
